transform_def.name: io_tile
transform_def.string: let d = 1 / if io_tile_d < 0 then -log(-io_tile_d) else log(io_tile_d) in io_tile_init_result(io_tile, d, io_tile_r / io_tile_d, io_tile_spread)

let c = complex(p_in.x, p_in.y) tl = floor(log(unit_rnd_0) * (if unit_rnd_1 < 0.5 then spread else -spread)) pr = complex(tl, tl * r) l = log(c) * d + pr z = exp(l / d) in (if d == 1.0 / 0.0 || d == 0 then p_in else toVec2(z)) * weight
